snippet.title: YO-KAI WATCH 2 - Official Game Trailer - Nintendo E3 2016
snippet.description:
Check out the official game trailer for YO-KAI WATCH 2 from Nintendo E3 2016. #YoKaiWatch2

Yo-kai Watch 2: Bony Spirits and Yo-kai Watch 2: Fleshy Souls are Available Now! http://yo-kai.nintendo.com/yw2/

Check out more information here! http://e3.nintendo.com/games/yo-kai-watch-2-3ds

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/Nintendo
